trait.name: Contortionist
entries: The manes can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

trait.name: Sickening Vapors
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 12}, each creature in a 5-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the manes at the end of the manes's turn. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to this manes's Sickening Vapors for 24 hours.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Necrotic damage.
